author: schor
msg: UIMA-1615 fix sandbox source build - the dir layout must match svn if the build is to work. Delete the uima-docbook-tool, because the build requires uima base now.  Update RAT exclusions to account for shift in src layout.  Include pom.xml in source builds.

author: maartenc
msg: Added "rat" target to build-release.xml that executes the RAT Ant tasks in order to find files with unapproved licenses.

author: jleroux
msg: In this case I don't need to persist the property.
This changes just do that : set temporary the property in memory, and reset it back to its original value
